Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' leading to 'Request Payment'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Request Payment' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that are preceded by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that lead to a payment being handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in relation to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases with 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that have amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage reduction of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' after implementing changes based on PPI analysis
Metric: the average of the function base < 0 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' by each 'org:resource'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in successful claim processes (ending in 'Payment Handled')
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' over 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in relation to all approvals (including 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in processes that required director approval
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in domestic trip claims vs. international trip claims
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in claims filed within two months after the trip
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' per month to monitor trends over time
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities
